practiceAreas: Workers' Compensation|Brain Injury|Car Accidents|Social Security - Disability|Trucking Accidents|Personal Injury|Products Liability|Construction Accidents|Defamation & Privacy - Plaintiff
description:
I am attorney Corey R. Pollard, and from my law office in Richmond, Virginia, I strive to provide the highest level of advocacy and support possible to clients across my area who have suffered serious injuries or lost loved ones because of workplace accidents or due to others' negligence or wrongdoings.

Over the course of my more than 10-year legal career, I have worked as an insurance defense attorney, so I have invaluable insight into the industry and the tactics that insurance companies use to reduce or deny claims. Armed with that experience, I can devise the most effective strategy possible to increase your chances of recovering the maximum amount of compensation that you deserve.

My law firm has become one of this area's premier injury legal practices for those dealing with any of the following legal challenges:

·Workers' compensation

·Car, truck and other motor vehicle accidents

·Traumatic brain injuries

·Social Security Disability

·Product liability

·Medical malpractice

·Construction accidents

·Wrongful death

Honored for my success as well as my outstanding professionalism and client service, I have earned consistent inclusion in The Best Lawyers in America and have earned recognition from The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 Under 40. I have also received recognition from Top 100 High Stakes Litigators in America, and Expertise voted me into the listing for Best Car Accident Lawyers in Newport News in 2020.

This means that you can expect to receive unmatched advocacy to help you through this very difficult and uncertain time in your life, and I promise to do all I can to improve the likelihood that you will receive the full amount of finances that you need to cover your medical bills, lost wages and other associated damages. To find out more, you can contact me, Corey R. Pollard, by calling my law office or visiting my website to schedule a free initial consultation.

The Best Lawyers in America 2013. Copyright 2012 by Woodward/White, Inc., Aiken, SC
